name: Pocket Factory
description:
The best merge game on your phone! To build your own factory, choose the smartest strategy!


Pocket Factory Features


• Merge items to upgrade.

• Produce your discovered item to earn money.

• Variety of items. There are more than 100 kinds of items in the game to discover.

• Idle system. Your machines will produce automatically. You can get money even when you are offline.

• Upgrade all of your factory!


Merge, produce, and make your factory become the most profitable one in the world!
